00061   {
00062     //  Phone home...
00063     parent::initialize();
00064     
00065     //  Initialize our valid log lvles
00066     self::$_validLogLevels = array();
00067 
00068     $_class = new ReflectionClass( __CLASS__ );
00069     $_constants = $_class->getConstants();
00070 
00071     foreach ( $_constants as $_name => $_value )
00072     {
00073       if ( 0 == strncasecmp( $_name, 'LOG_', 4 ) )
00074         self::$_validLogLevels[strtolower( substr( $_name, 4 ) )] = $_value;
00075     }
00076   }
